data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Patna, Bihar, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Patna, Bihar, India

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Patna.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Patna, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
There are 5,838,500 people living in the county of Patna. Only about 64,224 might be believers.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 5,838,500 citizens of the the county of Patna.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Beldar Laria (Hindu traditions) people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, encourage the 64,224 believers in Patna to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Patna, Bihar, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Patna do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
